alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 10:26AM CDT until June 15 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Choctaw County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1025 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Kinterbish, or 9 miles southeast of Cuba, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pennington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama.
